user.title: Add Streaming TTS Proxy

init.title: Streaming TTS Proxy Settings
init.description: Default voice parameters and fallback TTS server configuration.

data_description.sample_rate: Value for the WAV header, typically 22050. A mismatched value will change the audio pitch. It's a feature, not a bug.
data_description.fallback_voice: The voice name can be found in the Media > Text-to-Speech section after adding the server as a standard TTS integration.
data_description.fallback_sample_rate: Similar to the primary server's sample rate parameter.
data_description.fallback_supports_streaming: Enable this if the fallback server is running in the corresponding mode.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the TTS server to retrieve settings. Please check the host and port.
